title: "Xiaomi takes shot at premium AI phone sector"
excerpt: "Chinese technology company Xiaomi Corp will invest 20 billion yuan ($2.7 billion) in research and development this year, in an effort to crack the high-end, AI-backed smartphone market where competitors including Honor, Oppo and Vivo are all pushing to expand their presence, despite what experts call \"limited progress\" so far."
